Comments
The campus is safe, with security at every corner, so there's nothing to worry about while your there.
I'm not sure on whether or not that the college has any history on Greek life, but I would say so just by looking at it
I'm 100% sure on what kinds of clubs there are, but I would say there are plenty for everyone to join.
If you're going in a program for nursing or other major then you should come to Bcc. It's cheap than University schools.
I enjoy the library and the computer lab because it feels like home. So comfortable and relaxing, especially when you have your friends with you.
Usually your fiancial aid covers your tuition, or if you apply for scholarships they might even help pay for your stuff, including books.
There are many things to do at Bcc like, joining clubs, participating in a sport activity and so much more.
There happens to be a lunch room that is big, clean and you are able to plug your electronic devices in the outlets.
It's a Community College, so there are no dorms available.

There is a schedule that you would follow that will help you master your talents based upon your major. Some of the classes are fun and simple and some are little confusing, but they are not as hard if you ask for help and dedicate your time to do better.
Students who attend at Bronx Community College come out with new knowledge and great skills that will get you into a University or a job that you had always wanted.
The Campus is big and nice. The college has new buildings that look so beautiful and easy to navigate to. Most of all they have technology usage whenever you need it.

textAfterTable: Clubs and Activities all types of clubs exist here such as nursing, gardening, math, science, anime, theater and art. Great for these types of students this college is great for any student who wishes to succeed. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus bronx community college is located at the old nyu campus. one of my favorite places to visit is the architecturally beautiful hall of fame for great americans that was completed in 1900. it is an outdoor space where you will find along it's walkway bronze sculptures of great historical figures. What to do for fun if you want to experience a little art and culture then check out a play that the drama department puts together every semester. also, there's always a music event. if your the athletic type try out for a sports team or sign up for the yearly 5k run. you will always find flyers and emails regarding upcoming events where speakers, authors, poets and even artists will share their work. in addition you can always join a club, offered and open to all. sometimes the college has a movie night or a dance where you can do a little mingling. Food and Dining
